amendment.description: To place a restriction on the use of funds relating to the decennial census.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1634 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 83.

action.text: Amendment SA 1634 proposed by Senator Hagerty. (consideration: CR S2326-2327) To place a restriction on the use of funds relating to the decennial census.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1634 proposed by Senator Hagerty.
